                                        </a>

                                <div id="actionBox" class="margin-right-15">

                                    <div class="action-sheet">
                                        <a class="jubao" href="javascript:void(0);" id="report_279957654" style="display:inline-block">举报</a>

                                        <!-- 删除 -->
                                                                            </div>
                                </div>
                            </div>
                            <!-- 评论内容 -->
                            <div class="comment-main-list-item-content-comment padding-right-10">
                                <!-- 置顶标签 -->
                                                                <span>看着还不错，先报了名再说。</span>
                                <!-- radio_3_4 宽高比例3:4 -->
                                <!-- data-radio值 0 4:3，  1 1:1，  2 3:4 -->

                            <div class="comment-main-list-item-content-info">

                    <div class="comment-main-list-item-content">
                        <!-- highlight -->
                        <div class="list-item-level1 ">
                            <!-- 昵称区域 -->
                            <div class="comment-main-list-item-content-header">
                                <div>
                                    <!-- 用户昵称 -->
                                    <h3>
                                        <a href="https://zhiyou.smzdm.com/member/5892474813/pinglun" target="_blank">清风流水520</a>
                                    </h3>
                                    <!-- 作者标识 -->
                                                                            <div class="comment-main-list-item-content-header-author">

                                        </div>
                                                                        <!-- 用户等级 -->

                                            <img class="comment-main-list-item-content-header-level" src="https://res.smzdm.com/h5/h5_user/dist/assets/level/8.png">
                                        </a>
                                                                                                                <!-- 勋章 -->
                                        <img class="comment-main-list-item-content-header-medal" src="https://eimg.smzdm.com/202412/18/6762a5ba3fe0d9648.png" alt="">
                                                                    </div>
                                
                                <!-- 浮层 -->
                                <div id="actionBox" class="margin-right-15">
                                    <i class="J_more icon-more action-sheet-icon"></i>
                                    <div class="action-sheet">
                                        <a class="jubao" href="javascript:void(0);" id="report_279930583" style="display:inline-block">举报</a>
                                        <!-- 踩评论功能 -->
                                        <a class="caiNum" href="javascript:void(0);" id="cdc_oppose_279930583" data-item="3, 0, 279930583, 93656109, 279930583">踩评论<span>(0)</span></a>
                                        <!-- 删除 -->
                                                                            </div>
                                </div>
                            </div>
                            <!-- 评论内容 -->
                            <div class="comment-main-list-item-content-comment padding-right-10">
                                <!-- 置顶标签 -->
                                                                <span>页面中间“大额红包天天抽”可中银行卡满减红包（如500-20元）可还信用卡</span>
                                <!-- radio_3_4 宽高比例3:4 -->
                                <!-- data-radio值 0 4:3，  1 1:1，  2 3:4 -->
                                                                                                                            </div>
                            <!-- 用户信息 及点赞操作 -->
                            <div class="comment-main-list-item-content-info">
                                <div>
                                    <span>2023-10-24</span>

                                        <span>江苏</span>
                                                                  
                                </div>
                                
                                <div>
                                
                                                                        <!-- 点赞 -->
                                    <!-- 点赞后嵌套 class red -->
                                    <div class="comment-main-list-item-content-info-zan" id="cdc_support_279930583" data-item="3, 1, 279930583, 93656109, 279930583">
                                        <span>1</span>
                                        <i class="icon-thumb-up-o-thin"></i>
                                        <!-- 已点赞 -->
                                        <!-- <i class="icon-thumb-up"></i> -->
                                    </div>
                                    <!-- 回复 -->
                                    <div class="J_replay comment-main-list-item-content-info-replay">回复</div>
                                </div>
                            </div>
                            <!-- 展示出的回复框 -->
                            <div class="comment-main-list-item-content-textarea">
                                <!-- 回复表单 在隐藏域中填写参数 -->
                                <form class="comment-quick-form" onsubmit="return false;" method="post" action="">
                                    <input type="hidden" name="type" value="3">
                                    <input type="hidden" name="comment_type" value="">
                                    <input type="hidden" name="pid" value="93656109">
                                    <input type="hidden" name="parentid" value="279930583">

                                </form>

                    <div class="comment-main-list-item-content">
                        <!-- highlight -->
                        <div class="list-item-level1 ">
                            <!-- 昵称区域 -->
                            <div class="comment-main-list-item-content-header">
                                <div>
                                    <!-- 用户昵称 -->
                                    <h3>
                                        <a href="https://zhiyou.smzdm.com/member/7409432219/pinglun" target="_blank">小up主</a>
                                    </h3>
                                    <!-- 作者标识 -->
                                                                        <!-- 用户等级 -->
                                                                            <a href="https://zhiyou.smzdm.com/user/tequan/" target="_blank">
                                            <img class="comment-main-list-item-content-header-level" src="https://res.smzdm.com/h5/h5_user/dist/assets/level/8.png">
                                        </a>
                                                                                                                <!-- 勋章 -->
                                        <img class="comment-main-list-item-content-header-medal" src="https://eimg.smzdm.com/202412/19/6763b46f4c9c02316.png" alt="">

                                <!-- 浮层 -->
                                <div id="actionBox" class="margin-right-15">
                                    <i class="J_more icon-more action-sheet-icon"></i>
                                    <div class="action-sheet">
                                        <a class="jubao" href="javascript:void(0);" id="report_279949779" style="display:inline-block">举报</a>
                                        <!-- 踩评论功能 -->

                                        <!-- 删除 -->
                                                                            </div>
                                </div>
                            </div>
                            <!-- 评论内容 -->
                            <div class="comment-main-list-item-content-comment padding-right-10">
                                <!-- 置顶标签 -->
                                                                <span>先报名了再说</span>
                                <!-- radio_3_4 宽高比例3:4 -->
                                <!-- data-radio值 0 4:3，  1 1:1，  2 3:4 -->

                            <div class="comment-main-list-item-content-info">
                                <div>
                                    <span>2023-10-24</span>

                                    <i class="J_more icon-more action-sheet-icon"></i>
                                    <div class="action-sheet">
                                        <!-- 举报功能 cid为id里的数字 接口user/comment/ajax_comment_report-->

                                        <!-- 删除 -->

                                </div>

                                <!-- 置顶标签 -->
